summary: Successfully verified Affiliate Module API fixes and Frontend enhancements. The slash issue has been completely resolved and all missing buttons are now functional.
passed_tests: ✅ SLASH ISSUE FIXED - /v1/affiliates (no slash) endpoint works correctly
✅ Backend API endpoints all functional: affiliates, offers, links, payouts, creatives
✅ Frontend data loads successfully - No more 'Load Failed' errors
✅ All required buttons present and functional: Add Partner, New Offer, Generate Link, Record Payout, Add Creative
✅ All dialogs open properly when buttons are clicked
✅ All tabs (Partners, Offers, Tracking, Payouts, Creatives, Reports) load without errors
✅ Affiliate data displays correctly (2 affiliates: Best Bonus Media, Guru Network)
✅ Offers data displays correctly (2 offers available)

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All affiliate API endpoints working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All buttons functional, data loads correctly, no errors
